connector.description:
Upload data to Azure Storage Blob.

The Kamelet expects the following headers to be set:

- `file` / `ce-file`: as the file name to upload

If the header won't be set the exchange ID will be used as file name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-sink.ac.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-sink.accountName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-sink.ac.description: The Azure Storage Blob account name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-sink.co.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-sink.containerName
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-sink.co.description: The Azure Storage Blob container name.

camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-sink.ac.name: camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.azure-storage-blob-sink.ac.description: The Azure Storage Blob access Key.
